org.amv.access.sdk.hm.certificate

Interface Remote

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmvHmRemote

    public interface Remote

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <any> createDeviceCertificate(Keys keys)
      Request a new device certificate from the remote exchange.
      <any> downloadAccessCertificates(Keys keys, DeviceCertificate deviceCertificate)
      Download all access certificates for this device present on the remote exchange.
      <any> revokeAccessCertificate(Keys keys, DeviceCertificate deviceCertificate, java.lang.String accessCertificateId)
      Revoke a single access certificate from the remote exchange.

    • Method Detail

      • createDeviceCertificate

        <any> createDeviceCertificate(Keys keys)
        Request a new device certificate from the remote exchange.
        Parameters:
        keys - The key pair associated with this device
        Returns:
        an observable emitting the device certificate including the issuer key

      • downloadAccessCertificates

        <any> downloadAccessCertificates(Keys keys,
                                 DeviceCertificate deviceCertificate)
        Download all access certificates for this device present on the remote exchange.
        Parameters:
        keys - The key pair associated with this device
        deviceCertificate - The device certificate associated with this device
        Returns:
        an observable emitting all present access certificates for this device.

      • revokeAccessCertificate

        <any> revokeAccessCertificate(Keys keys,
                              DeviceCertificate deviceCertificate,
                              java.lang.String accessCertificateId)
        Revoke a single access certificate from the remote exchange.
        Parameters:
        keys - The key pair associated with this device
        deviceCertificate - The device certificate associated with this device
        accessCertificateId - The id of the access certificate to be revoked
        Returns:
        an observable emitting true on success
